question_text: Which of the following are valid behaviors when switching between eSIM profiles? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: You may activate a different phone number
You may change carriers without replacing hardware
The eSIM profile is physically removed
You may store multiple carrier profiles on one device
correct_answer: You may activate a different phone number
You may change carriers without replacing hardware
You may store multiple carrier profiles on one device
explanation: eSIM can store multiple profiles, each with its own phone number or carrier. Profiles are digital and can be swapped, not physically removed.
